cat.lump.ir.retrievalmodels.similarity

Enum Similarity

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Similarity>
      • cat.lump.ir.retrievalmodels.similarity.Similarity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Similarity>

    public enum Similarity
extends java.lang.Enum<Similarity>
    This enumeration contains the similarity models and characterizations available.
    Each element has the type of representation of the data that it needs and the similarity model it uses. Both can be null if they are not required.
    Moreover, they have a friendly name that can be used to identify them.
    Author:
    jboldoba
